column1: My website has a page dedicated to regular updates on new facts and advisories about #COVID19. Check it out today for the latest information on #OperationWarpSpeed vaccine candidates and the encouraging news on those fronts.  https://t.co/UZHEppAvYl

More good news on #COVID19 vaccines! @moderna_tx says its candidate is showing >90% effectiveness. We're indebted to medical innovators & the Trump Admin's efforts through #OperationWarpSpeed for their tireless work to deliver a vaccine in record time. https://t.co/k1flxqG7xV

This is encouraging news about the development of a #COVID19 vaccine. Thanks to our medical researchers & the Trump Admin for their dedication to fighting this virus & for working together effectively to deliver a vaccine for the American people. https://t.co/plJyaARTy0
The US economy is still rebounding with a record-setting 33.1% GDP growth over the last quarter! The #GreatAmericanComeback from the losses of #COVID19 continues! https://t.co/LRwu4uxoOQ

Read this helpful breakdown of #OperationWarpSpeed by @HHSGov Secretary Azar. This initiative to develop a #COVID19 vaccine has partnered the public & private industries in uniquely American ways. Now we are closer to a vaccine than many thought possible. https://t.co/E2i10a6yb8

Today Senate Democrats once again blocked clean #COVID19 relief legislation proving once again that radical Democrats are more interested in playing political games than helping American workers and businesses. The American people deserve better. https://t.co/ZPqdjUUvax

Check out this helpful update from @CDCgov on #COVID19 vaccine development under #OperationWarpSpeed the initiative to expedite the process. The Trump Administration's dedication to working towards a safe vaccine on such a fast timeline is commendable.  https://t.co/rD2zgRtTaT

This is good news as one more vaccine candidate means a higher chance of producing an effective one. The Trump Administration should be commended for its #OperationWarpSpeed effort to develop a safe #COVID19 vaccine on such a fast timeline. https://t.co/76ZtyGHAMo

Last night I introduced the #Coronavirus Relief Fund Flexibility Act. The goals of it are to reduce waste to give states more choice in how unspent relief money is spent and to incentivize needed infrastructure. Read my full statement here:  https://t.co/ASf0nu2G64

The economic fallout from #COVID19 has been severe and sadly many have used the crisis for their own ends. Fraudulent unemployment claims have already become a problem so today I introduced a bill to try to reduce fraud and waste. Read more here: https://t.co/oW0MReE7Ji

Smart reopening of businesses and letting Americans work continue to prove the best antidotes to the economic hardship brought on by the #COVID19 crisis. Recovery is going strong and I look forward to seeing job numbers increase even more! https://t.co/ImpLRCkTmP

The recovery continues! For the fourth month in a row since the peak of #COVID19 the #JobsReport has exceeded expectations and the unemployment rate has dropped. There's still work to do but the American economy is coming back strong.  https://t.co/zjHDMMEKR7

Another vaccine candidate is making positive strides! #OperationWarpSpeed is accomplishing what many would have thought impossible a few months ago. I commend the Trump Administration for its work to ensure a safe & effective #COVID19 vaccine is produced in historic record time. https://t.co/UuzXLWwOCA

Multiple #COVID19 vaccine candidates are nearing or are already conducting final-stage trials. This is a huge step in defeating the virus and the Trump Administration should be commended for its work to develop a vaccine on a historically fast timeline. #OperationWarpSpeed https://t.co/ZZ8Pvtq8KU

With every supposed #COVID19 relief bill Democrats have proven they will let no crisis go to waste. The latest legislation is once again a wish list of far leftist agenda items that would be devastating for the American economy and way of life. https://t.co/Z9HaBiAasM

More good news! The #JobsReport has beat expectations again for July proving that America is still recovering amidst this difficult time of fighting #COVID19. American ingenuity and hard work continue to be the best antidotes to our current challenges. https://t.co/H8Dv4AexNn

Don’t forget: TOMORROW is the last day to apply for the #PaycheckProtectionProgram! Be sure to make the most of this program that has helped keep so many businesses open as we fight #COVID19. Learn more and apply: https://t.co/AN2vy10xRl https://t.co/IRGHdJsRs9

Did you know plasma in those recovered from #COVID19 still contains antibodies that could help a sick person fight the virus? If you've recovered from #COVID19 consider donating plasma as one more way to help America defeat this pandemic. Read more: https://t.co/tu3Sn7IiQq https://t.co/o2f1uvvHgs

ICYMI: My latest at @dcexaminer on how Dems' proposed stimulus is "eerily similar" to the one passed in 2009 w/ disastrous results. @realDonaldTrump's economy was booming before #COVID19. We need Americans at work to recover that not expanded welfare.   https://t.co/lLmkAhs5JL

There are still 2 weeks left to apply for a #PaycheckProtectionProgram loan! The PPP has had a crucial role in keeping small businesses open and employees on payroll as we navigate the #COVID19 crisis. Applications open till August 8th! Learn more here: https://t.co/AN2vy10xRl https://t.co/zSDOtrz1Lj

Democrats' #NoBanAct is not about policy but undermining @POTUS. They planned to pass this bill in March but pulled it as #COVID19 spread & travel restrictions ensued for safety reasons. This shows the bill's recklessness. It undermines any president's ability to keep us safe.

Thanks for having me on to talk #FSA accounts Ric! People's 2020 #FSA funds are now at risk due to #COVID19 closures all over the country. I'm working to ensure that those dollars are protected. No one should be penalized for planning ahead. https://t.co/YQNd4jknAy

Thanks to strong leadership & smart reopening efforts the economy is on the road to recovery from #COVID19. The May Jobs Report surpassed expectations and proves that Americans at work are the best thing for the economy. Let's keep up the effort by continuing to #ReopenAmerica https://t.co/7hbaQkLKk0

I'm pleased POTUS has issued an EO that directs federal agencies to expedite the review of infrastructure projects that are critical to jumpstarting our economy in the wake of the #COVID19 pandemic. https://t.co/aha9QA0cb5

I'm pleased President @realDonaldTrump has highlighted the importance of faith communities during this difficult time for our country. Check out these new interim guidelines from @CDCgov on how churches can safely hold services while we navigate #COVID19. https://t.co/25MfQ0ifaT

I'm pleased that @TheJusticeDept has awarded supplemental emergency funding to Blount Co among many others in light of the #COVID19 crisis. Thank you DOJ for helping our small towns and counties! #AL06  @BlountCommish @city_oneonta https://t.co/pC9RR2ad5o

Disgraceful. These funds must be recovered and an investigation should be opened at once.  Planned Parenthood affiliates improperly applied for and received $80 million in coronavirus stimulus funds feds say https://t.co/tnpRVBg4me #FoxNews

President @realDonaldTrump deserves credit for how he has taken action to save American lives & save our health care system amidst the #COVID19 outbreak.   The truth about Trump's COVID-19 task force response - Washington Times https://t.co/9eZEqn5f34

Last Friday I spoke on the House floor to oppose Pelosi's $3 trillion bill that's been posed as #COVID19 aid but is really a package of left-wing priorities & a threat to national security. Palmer on Pelosi's $3 Trillion Left-Wing-Dream-Come-True Bill https://t.co/lBtoUncAGq

Thank you to @realDonaldTrump and your administration for all you’ve done for #Alabama since the beginning of the #COVID19 outbreak. It is a formidable challenge but I’m confident in our ability to work through it together. https://t.co/dQ0N2LalUk

As of the end of April @HHSGov had granted over $18.3 million in funding from the CARES Act to 17 different health centers across Alabama specifically to help combat the COVID-19 pandemic. Read more here: https://t.co/ekYd0l1Z3Z

As of Apr 27 through the legislation passed by Congress the @CDCgov has provided over $17.2 million to Alabama. Read more here on how the Administration has helped AL amidst the #COVID19 outbreak. Check my website often for updates! https://t.co/EKlkWcShI3

Good to talk with @CBS_42 last night about why Congress needs to protect FSAs in light of #COVID19. People should not be penalized for future planning.  Rep. Gary Palmer joins CBS 42 to discuss the protection of flex spending accounts amid coronavirus https://t.co/NCLcr1U5Id

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram is doing vital work to keep businesses open and support their employees while the US navigates the #COVID19 crisis. Read about businesses #PPP is helping here:  https://t.co/XOXE9uFeIV

FSAs are important for future planning so there should be protection for people's hard-earned FSA dollars in the wake of #COVID19. A bipartisan group of my colleagues & I wrote to leadership in the House & Senate on this issue. Full statement & letter: https://t.co/keLfyIqeRf

Good to catch up with @abc3340 about latest updates on #COVID19 Congress's responsibilities from here & reopening the economy. Hard work is still ahead but we're #InItTogether & will come out stronger.  The full interview with Representative Gary Palmer https://t.co/oezoI8dsf7

Mark your calendars for this Thursday 4/23! My colleague & Ranking Member on the Small Business Committee @RepSteveChabot is joining me on a telephone town hall about small business concerns amid the #COVID19 pandemic. Call 888-598-4224 to join in and ask questions! https://t.co/xnUiO9RzxB

Speaker Pelosi does America a disservice by refusing to reconvene Congress and blocking legislation that could help small businesses survive #COVID19. Congress should be stepping up to do our job right now. Full statement: https://t.co/NN9LsSYq5h

Proud of how @wellnesspharm continues to step up and serve #AL06 and beyond during the #COVID19 crisis. Thank you Wellness! #InItTogether Homewood pharmacy discusses COVID-19 demands https://t.co/nkJw8Z9H9z

I'm so proud of how the people of Alabama have stepped up during this tough time to help each other rally around first responders support local businesses and more. Click here to read about how our great state has come together to fight #COVID19: https://t.co/m3Y9n85AWV https://t.co/o8IzUicNWL

The @USTreasury has released an updated FAQ sheet about the #PaycheckProtectionProgram which will help small businesses keep their employees on payroll during the #COVID19 crisis. Read here: https://t.co/9lh5uSRmM5

@SBAgov has released guidance on the #PaycheckProtectionProgram a loan program that helps small businesses keep their employees on payroll during the #COVID19 crisis. Read more information and how to apply here:  https://t.co/6NJgmIv15C https://t.co/OmOUKqjAU9
Need to apply for an @SBAgov Economic Injury Disaster Loan due to #COVID19? Here's where you can start the process: https://t.co/X4rI1w0a5B

President Trump has extended his social distancing guidelines through April 30th to continue America's efforts to slow the spread of #COVID19. Keep doing your part and we will defeat this crisis together. #InItTogether https://t.co/7NlJ1yX8pp

The bill passed today was not done in the best way or under the best circumstances. There are helpful parts that help fight #COVID19 & mitigate its impact but there are also harmful parts that drive up the national deficit. My full statement:   https://t.co/edOpAKGPwM

Valuable time has been lost over the past few days because of how Pelosi and her Democrat colleagues have exploited the #COVID19 crisis to try to advance their own partisan agenda. The American people need help NOW. https://t.co/wdfoVrSv3K

#AL06! I'm hosting a telephone town hall for your #COVID19 questions TOMORROW night w/ Dr. Scott Harris from @ALPublicHealth. If you have questions about the coronavirus disease social distancing flattening the curve etc. we want to hear from you. Call 844-227-7559 to join! https://t.co/QQsBNFPNug

There are easy ways to support small local businesses while maintaining #SocialDistancing: -Order takeout or curbside pickup -Order a gift card -Shop online If you're a business owner worried about the impact of #COVID19 see resources from @SBAgov:  https://t.co/a32LEE6bDl https://t.co/ZocpMnGwsf
Do your part to #SlowtheSpread and #FlattentheCurve! Everyone can take these steps to fight #COVID19. We are #InItTogether and will overcome this challenge. https://t.co/Qq08pPuF6b

A big thank you to our brave first responders and medical professionals who are on the frontlines every day as we fight #COVID19. Be sure to show your appreciation to these courageous workers! #InItTogether https://t.co/v9aySASejJ
Are you a small business owner concerned about the impact of #COVID19? Check out these helpful guidelines and resources from @SBAgov:   https://t.co/iVKVOrZgFO

@POTUS and @CDCgov have released these guidelines that everyone can follow to help #SlowtheSpread of #COVID19. Now is the time to work together to protect the most vulnerable among us and the next 15 days are critical. See below and do your part! #InitTogether https://t.co/sXxAkHJOt0

To help #AL06 navigate the #COVID19 outbreak my website has a new page with local resource info general important facts about coronavirus updates from the Administration and more. Check back often for updates! https://t.co/UZHEppAvYl

#COVID19 testing in #AL06:  •Assurance Scientific Labs has drive-thru testing 10am-2pm at Church of the Highlands Grandview: https://t.co/Q3wWtYtVE9 •Urgent Care for Children has curbside tests for ages 0-21. Locations in Vestavia Trussville & 280: https://t.co/WnRiDtQAAY

Social distancing is one of the most important parts of mitigating the spread of #COVID19 right now. That means:  -Avoid large gatherings -Don't travel -Refrain from physical contact (handshakes hugs) I encourage everyone to follow @CDCgov's regular updates and recommendations. https://t.co/vGT4i3PLq9

This week I joined @alexsalvinews on @OANN's After Hours to discuss gov response to #COVID19 including distribution of test kits travel restrictions and more. Watch here:   Rep. Palmer on COVID-19 with Alex Salvi on OANN's After Hours https://t.co/znHfQqlSCM via @YouTube

Amid concern on #COVID19 there are easy precautions all can take like hand-washing and staying home if you feel sick.  -For up to date info visit https://t.co/VHIpOsHQnL.  -Read on CDC response here: https://t.co/AiWsY4dXOf -Travel advisories here: https://t.co/mD74tH9b4b https://t.co/2PA4dcyQQN

The FUTURE Act includes the #NoBanAct which undermines POTUS's authority to limit entry of some foreign nationals. This authority was used recently to combat #Coronavirus but this bill would remove it. My statement on the bill & my amendment to it here: https://t.co/qQ3XufUGwT

The House passed an emergency funding package today for needed research and response to the #Coronavirus. I'm glad Congress has pulled together to assist the administration in its efforts to fight the virus and I applaud @VP Pence's leadership on this important matter. https://t.co/x9PjXUlk8X
